name: Mitigation Playbook for Remote Script Execution Incident
description: Addresses an incident involving the exploitation of a web application leading to remote script execution, data exfiltration, and a privilege escalation attempt.

parallel--ff3c4941-d2f3-457f-9178-e92cef.name: Execute Simultaneous Mitigations
parallel--ff3c4941-d2f3-457f-9178-e92cef.description: Perform several operations simultaneously to mitigate threat.

action--55f0e8c2-27f3-4ae3-b579-63e0b20a.name: Kill malicious script process
action--55f0e8c2-27f3-4ae3-b579-63e0b20a.description: Terminate the process running the malicious script.

if-condition--be9a5b4f-e707-4f93-aebe-40.name: Check Host Compromise
if-condition--be9a5b4f-e707-4f93-aebe-40.description: Condition to determine if the host is compromised.

action--9d5124c9-a463-4e97-96c3-f9a25726.name: Quarantine affected host
action--9d5124c9-a463-4e97-96c3-f9a25726.description: Disconnect the compromised host from the network.

while-condition--39aa7ed7-bdf2-4949-b329.name: Scan for Additional Malicious Scripts
while-condition--39aa7ed7-bdf2-4949-b329.description: Iterate to find malicious scripts until none are found.

action--7f4d8f6a-4b5e-4855-9bc1-98256a01.name: Scan for additional malicious scripts
action--7f4d8f6a-4b5e-4855-9bc1-98256a01.description: Locate and identify malicious scripts in the system.

action--c2a3995f-9a4f-4b6e-b6fd-066d7076.name: Reset compromised accounts
action--c2a3995f-9a4f-4b6e-b6fd-066d7076.description: Expire passwords for compromised user accounts.

action--39a263de-b453-4f83-b7ee-7b309f4b.name: Block outbound connections to malicious domains
action--39a263de-b453-4f83-b7ee-7b309f4b.description: Prevent further data exfiltration by blocking access to malicious domains.
